name: moocup
description: Moocup is a self-hosted mockup generator allowing users to insert images into templated scenes for product previews. It supports custom assets and a lightweight UI that runs entirely in the browser.
features: Template library: Choose from pre-built mockup scenes for devices, packaging, and marketing materials.
Image insertion: Upload designs and automatically fit them into template perspectives with proper scaling.
Browser-based rendering: Generate mockups entirely in the client without server processing for instant results.
Custom templates: Add your own mockup scenes by defining image placement zones and background assets.
Export options: Download finished mockups as high-resolution PNG or JPG files for presentations and portfolios.
No watermarks: Create professional product previews without branding or usage restrictions on output images.
Batch processing: Generate multiple variations by swapping designs across different template scenes quickly.
Lightweight hosting: Deploy as static files with no backend requirements for simple maintenance and scaling.
